principles: Fusion: Bloomberg Terminal density x Luxury Hotel Concierge service x Indian Cultural warmth
Emotion: Every pixel must convey 'Control' and 'Service'
Contrast: Deep Slate backgrounds vs. Glowing Saffron accents
Shape: Aggressive 2.5rem (40px) rounding for containers vs. sharp data grids

rules: Use 'tracking-tight' on all headings larger than 24px.

Card.base: bg-slate-900/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-slate-800 rounded-[2.5rem] p-6 shadow-xl

Button.primary: bg-orange-500 hover:bg-orange-600 text-white font-semibold rounded-full px-8 py-3 shadow-lg shadow-orange-500/20 transition-all active:scale-95
Button.secondary: bg-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-700 text-white font-medium rounded-full px-6 py-3 border border-slate-700
Button.ghost: text-slate-400 hover:text-orange-400 hover:bg-orange-500/10 rounded-full px-4 py-2

Input.base: bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 focus:border-orange-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-orange-500 rounded-xl h-12 px-4 text-slate-200 placeholder:text-slate-600

Ticker.container: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-10 bg-slate-950 border-t border-slate-800 flex items-center z-50 overflow-hidden

general: Implement the 'Executive Saffron' theme strictly: Slate-900 background, Orange-500 accents.
Use the 2.5rem border radius for all main layout containers (Sidebar, Main Content Area, Dashboard Cards).
Ensure the Ticker Tape is always visible at the bottom.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Public Sans' for body text.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds; use solid Slate-900 or Slate-950.
Use the provided image URLs for avatars and dashboard widgets.
dashboard: Implement a Bento Grid layout for the 'Briefing Room'.
The 'Live Feed' should look like a high-density news ticker list.
Use Recharts with a custom theme (Orange lines, dark background).
help_people: Design the Grievance list as a high-density table with status badges.
Use the 'village_meeting' image as a header background for this section.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
